idea:
India’s #1 Trusted Refurbished Electronics Brand, hyperXchange, launched "Nuboxed" in October, 2021 as a D2C focused Global play with ESG impact.


Stand for Trust

The fast-growing refurbished electronics is dominated by the grey market, lacking structure and consumer trust. Nuboxed is on a mission to build the trustmark of quality and convenience for this market. 

 

Disrupt with Automation

Nuboxed leverages it’s proprietary Faraday hardware to evaluate and price preowned electronics, both at retail and enterprise scale, and also acts as quality control for refurbishment process. This removes human oversight and makes the procurement-to-sales cycle globally scalable.


Build Phygital D2C network

Nuboxed uses its last-mile franchisees as well as leading online marketplaces to create an infinitely scalable network for procurement and sales offline+online.

 

Create homegrown tech for an unique industry

Nuboxed leverages connected technologies across it’s value chain, to build scalable + traceable processes, with quantified + actionable feedback to learn and improve:

- ELVIS

The core of the Nuboxed ecosystem is built on top of ELVIS ERP. Implementing microservices architecture on AWS using Node JS, Java Springboot, ELVIS powers the entire Nuboxed Ecosystem with Intelligent Data Management.


- VR Application

Nuboxed VR application provides an unique shopping experience to the customers by providing near-real life store view based on React Native platform.


- Faraday

Faraday is Nuboxed’s patented hardware + software solution that leverages the power of AI, IoT, and advanced camera technology to ascertain device health and calculate price offer


Save the Planet

We are in a world with limited resources. At Nuboxed we are building a sustainable way to not just recycle - but reuse. Nuboxed is on its way to become the largest global market for refurbished electronics  


We are doing this in three clear steps:

#1. Locking in supply

#2. Control refurb quality through tech

#3. Aggregate last-mile capability worldwide for integrated sourcing, repair and warranty through affiliated technicians
name: NUBOXED TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
One language dies every 14 days. 

Around 1 million animal and plant species are now threatened with extinction

Music instruments, art and crafts are also fast disappearing across the world


Today, we are increasingly losing the diversity of human civilisations across the planet, facing the sixth mass extinction, while also facing the challenge of developing a sustainable and regenerative economy and providing livelihoods.


TerraPortier’s mission is to connect the youth across the globe to the cultural and bio diversity on the planet - thereby sustaining and creating livelihoods ,supporting local economies and sustainable development.

With our innovative storytelling platform, we will connect the digital storytelling to the real life impact by giving our customers an opportunity to buy items that are made by local artisans or are inspired by and would directly benefit the grassroots economy and biodiversity.
name: TerraPortier

idea:
We are a startup envisioned to provide a product to people for their Urban Air Mobility, which is

Efficient, Sustainable and Fun to Ride.

Our vision is to build an Aircraft for Urban Air Mobility (UAM). The aircraft is powered by Fuel

Cell. Fuel cell technology is a greener option to conventional fuel or gasoline. The aircraft has a

broad range of applications from transporting people, logistics, fire fighting (especially forest

fires), medical emergencies, military surveillance and so on.
name: ENCOM AVIATION PRIVATE LIMITED
